languages.text: "Капеллан — глубоко верующий слуга Императора. Он, как никто другой, близко знаком с человеческими пороками, и оттого его слова полнятся искренностью. Паства слушает его и уважает. А то, что в этой пастве довольно отъявленных мерзавцев и головорезов — пускай. Наше учение ни от кого не отворачивается, если они готовы раскрыть свою душу".

traits.locale_text: "Капеллан — глубоко верующий слуга Императора. Он, как никто другой, близко знаком с человеческими пороками и оттого его слова полнятся искренностью. Паства слушает его и уважает. А то, что в этой пастве полно отъявленных мерзавцев и головорезов — пускай. Наше учение ни от кого не отворачивается, если они готовы раскрыть свою душу и внемлить".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."
languages.original_text: "Капеллан — глубоко верующий слуга Императора. Он, как никто другой, близко знаком с человеческими пороками, и оттого его слова полнятся искренностью. Паства слушает его и уважает. А то, что в этой пастве довольно отъявленных мерзавцев и головорезов — пускай. Наше учение ни от кого не отворачивается, если они готовы раскрыть свою душу".

traits.locale_text: "The Chaplain is a deeply believing servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not. Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open soul."

Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open soul."

His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

languages.text: “这位是牧师，是帝皇虔诚的仆人。很少有人能像他一样，对人类的恶行了如指掌。也正是如此，他的话语总是充满真诚。他的信徒尊敬他，愿意听从他的指引。至于那些顽固不化的流氓恶棍，他们也同样可以成为信徒，有何不可呢？只要他们愿意敞开心扉，接受圣德鲁苏斯的教诲，我们的教义不会将任何人排除在外。”
languages.original_text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

traits.locale_text: “这位是牧师，是帝皇虔诚的仆人。很少有人能像他一样，对人类的恶行了如指掌，这也是为什么他的话语总是充满真诚。他的信徒尊敬他，愿意听从他的指引。至于那些顽固不化的流氓恶棍，他们也同样可以成为信徒，有何不可呢？只要他们愿意敞开灵魂，接受圣德鲁苏斯的教诲，我们的教义不会将任何人排除在外。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「教戒官は強い信仰を持つ皇帝の信奉者だ。彼ほど人間の悪徳に慣れ親しんでいる者はいないだろう。だからこそ、その言葉は本心から来ている。彼の信徒にも信頼されている。その信徒の一員には堅物のならず者や熾烈な殺人者たちもいるが…まぁいい。誰一人として教義を拒絶する者はいない。心を開いてその言葉を受け入れる限りは」
languages.original_text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

traits.locale_text: 「教戒官は強い信仰を持つ皇帝の信奉者だ。彼ほど人間の悪徳に慣れ親しんでいる者はいないだろう。だからこそ、その言葉は本心から来ている。彼の信徒にも信頼されている。その信徒の一員には堅物のならず者や熾烈な殺人者たちもいるが…まぁいい。誰一人として教義を拒絶する者はいない。心を開いてその言葉を受け入れる限りは」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Capellán es un servidor profundamente devoto del Emperador. Pocos conocen tan íntimamente el vicio humano como él y eso es lo que llena de sinceridad sus palabras. Su rebaño le escucha y le respeta, y en cuanto a los bandidos y sicarios empedernidos que forman parte de él... por qué no. Nuestra doctrina no rehúye a nadie, siempre que esté dispuesto a recibir su palabra con la mente abierta».
languages.original_text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

traits.locale_text: «El capellán es un servidor profundamente creyente del Emperador. Pocos conocen tan íntimamente el vicio humano como él y eso es lo que llena de sinceridad sus palabras. Su rebaño le escucha y le respeta, y en cuanto a los bandidos y sicarios empedernidos que forman parte de él... por qué no. Nuestra doctrina no rehúye a nadie, siempre que esté dispuesto a recibir su palabra con el alma abierta».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Der Ordenspriester ist ein tiefgläubiger Diener des Imperators. Kaum jemand ist so vertraut mit menschlichen Lastern wie er, und das erfüllt seine Worte mit Ehrlichkeit. Seine Anhänger hören auf ihn und respektieren ihn. Und was all die abgefeimten Schurken und Halsabschneider angeht, die nicht zu diesen Anhängern gehören ... warum nicht? Unsere Doktrin lehnt niemanden ab, so lange er nur bereit ist, unsere Botschaft mit offenem Herzen zu empfangen."
languages.original_text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ordenspriester ist ein tiefgläubiger Diener des Imperators. Kaum jemand ist so vertraut mit menschlichen Lastern wie er, und das erfüllt seine Worte mit Ehrlichkeit. Seine Anhänger hören auf ihn und respektieren ihn. Und was all die abgefeimten Schurken und Halsabschneider angeht, die nicht zu diesen Anhängern gehören ... warum nicht? Unsere Doktrin lehnt niemanden ab, so lange er nur bereit ist, unsere Botschaft mit offener Seele zu empfangen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Chapelain est un fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur. Il est plus familier du vice humain que quiconque, et c'est ce qui le rend si sincère. Ses ouailles l'écoutent et le respectent. Certes, il y a parmi eux des bandits et des assassins de premier ordre, mais après tout, pourquoi pas ? Tant qu'ils sont prêts à ouvrir leur cœur à Sa parole, notre doctrine les accueille à bras ouverts. »
languages.original_text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

traits.locale_text: « Chapelain est un fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur. Il est plus familier du vice que quiconque, et c'est ce qui le rend si sincère. Ses ouailles l'écoutent et le respectent. Certes, il y a parmi eux des bandits et des assassins de premier ordre, mais après tout, pourquoi pas ? Tant qu'ils sont prêts à ouvrir leur âme à Sa parole, notre doctrine les accueille à bras ouverts. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Papaz, İmparator'un bir hizmetkârıdır ve kendini O'na derinden adamıştır. İnsanların içindeki kötülüğe bu kadar yürekten aşina olan ve sözlerindeki samimiyet bu kadar yoğun olan birini daha bulmak çok zordur. Yanındaki o kaşarlanmış serseriler ve caniler ise... Neden olmasın? Öğretimiz kimseyi dışlamaz. Yeter ki kelamını açık yüreklilikle kabul etmeye hazır olsunlar."
languages.original_text: "Chaplain is a deeply devout servant of the Emperor. Few are as intimately familiar with human vice as him, and that is what fills his words with sincerity. His flock heeds and respects him. And as for all the hardened rascals and cutthroats who are part of that flock — why not? Our doctrine shuns no one, so long as they are willing to receive its word with an open heart."

traits.locale_text: "Papaz, İmparator'un bir hizmetkârıdır ve kendini en derin bir şekilde O'na adamıştır. İnsanların içindeki kötülüğe bu kadar derinden aşina olan ve sözlerindeki samimiyet bu kadar yoğun olan birini daha bulmak çok zordur. Yanındaki o kaşarlanmış serseriler ve caniler ise... Neden olmasın? Öğretimiz kimseyi dışlamaz. Yeter ki kelamını açık yüreklilikle kabul etmeye hazır olsunlar."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
